entry.title: About
entry.summary:
Hi, I'm Chris and I'm a Data Scientist living in Seattle with my wonderful wife and occasionally-wonderful Shih Tzu, Bubba. I'm always on the lookout for amazing new experiences - as along as it doesn't involve pursing a second PhD (lol), paying San Fransisco rent (lolol), or endorsing pizza places outside of my homestate of New York (lololol). So, if you do have something amazing, feel free to send a message:

donotbugchris@gmail.com

Professional Interests:  Data Analytics, Machine Learning, Engineering Products, Optics 

Personal Interests: Video/ Board Games, Biking, Piano, Single Origin Esoteric Coffee

Cookie Interests: Chocolate Chip, Crackle, Gingersnap
